BIO

My name is Adetunji Bodunde, a graduate of Ladoke Akintola University of Technology Ogbomoso, the department of Computer Science and Engineering.
I am experienced in Full-Stack Web development with sound knowledge of HTML5,CSS3, JAVASCRIPT, JQuery, NODEJS, MONGODB, MySQL, Bootstrap4, Materialise CSS, Git and GitHub.
I consider myself hardworking/reiable/dependable/helpful/outgoing/organised/honest/cooperative.
